column1: short of length on middle and leg, nurdled to fine leg
much better this time. Floats a length ball on middle and off, Tharanga confidently defends
laced this through cover. Nothing like a flowing drive to get you going. Wide half-volley, Tharanga leans forward and puts this away without much fuss.
steers this back of length delivery on off stump to square third man
this one nips back in from length on middle, Dickwella plays outside the line and is hit high on the thigh pad
much better. Length and closer to the stumps, solidly defended.
gets some inward movement but this is a touch short, on middle and leg, worked into the gap at deep backward square leg
around the off-stump channel at good length, Tharanga watches this through to MS Dhoni

beautiful drive, creamed through cover. Looking for the late swing and so he pitched this up outside off, Tharanga planted forward and put that away into the gap. Didn't try to hit it hard. Pure timing, typical left-hander's elegance
driven again but this time he's hit that straight to the man at extra cover. He was moved there from second slip specifically for this kind of stroke
hustles him with a length ball on middle, Tharanga hops back into the crease and blocks
gets this to nip back into middle from the good length area, defended solidly
much fuller and just around off, eased to Rohit at short cover
slower delivery but this is a touch short on middle and off, Dickwella runs this down to third man
struck on the pad but this one pitched way outside leg. Short of length delivery, kept a touch low as well. Tharanga was overbalanced as he tried to work that away.
bends one back into middle and leg, flicked straight to square leg. Tharanga's hitting them beautifully today
tucks him up for room with a length ball on middle, tucked to the leg side for an easy single

as far as return catches go, it can't get simpler than that. Bhuvneshwar's first wicket of the series. This is a knuckleball, the variation in pace does Dickwella in as he looks to flick but this one just stops on him and he ends up chipping it back to the bowler on his followthrough.
floats this full on middle and off, defended back down the pitch
full and just outside off, crunched straight to cover point
this is simply sensation. There are three fielders on the off side ring and he still picks the gap. Width on offer and he flays this away into the gap between cover point and point
pulled into the gap at deep backward square leg. Got into an awkward position as the ball kept low but he went through with the stroke
opens the bat face late to ease this length ball outside off to square third man
play and a miss. Full and swinging away, he went for an expansive drive with minimal footwork, beaten.
mistimes an on-drive to mid-on but they scamper through for a quick single. Kuldeep was a little deep, and so wasn't able to get to the ball quickly enough
looks to work this square on the leg side but the ball zips back in to deflect off the pad to short square leg

quick bouncer, so quick that even MS Dhoni couldn't stop that with one hand despite leaping like a goalkeeper. This was targeted at the body but ended up pitching it wide outside off, Tharanga swayed out of the way and saw the ball race to the boundary.
right besides the line of that indipper as he bunts it back down the pitch
angles a full ball on middle and leg, turned into the gap between midwicket and square leg
has he gloved this bouncer? No. Went for the hook, this was a skiddy bouncer and he's beaten him for pace. Don't often see Bhuvneshwar do that but this was a serious effort ball.
blasts this past mid-on. Right into his swinging arc from around the stumps, showed the full face of the bat as he drilled this from outside off.
mistimes a pull to Chahal at square leg this time. Wasn't all that short

belted that through deep square. In complete control of the pull. Short of length on middle and leg, Tharanga picked the length early, transferred the weight back and kept it all along the ground as he put that away.
much better. Fuller on leg stump, defended to short midwicket. This was a slower delivery as well
knuckleball this time, lands this at length around off stump, bunted to cover
excellent bouncer. Short on middle and leg, Tharanga ducks under it this time
looks to play a short-arm jab but somehow ends up skewing this over the bowler's head. Mid-on can't get around. Not entirely in control

sensational from Kohli! He was back-pedalling from mid-off but never lost sight of the ball. This was lofted as Munaweera made room to loft, but didn't get under the length properly - this was another knuckleball - which meant he didn't get the power he would've liked. Kohli timed his jump well, even with the momentum taking him back furiously, to pull it off.
much fuller and just around off, he shows the full face of the bat in defense
right behind the line of that length ball as he bunts to point
gets this to nip away off the surface from length on middle and off, defended confidently
skiddy length ball angling into middle from around the stumps, he hops back into the crease and defends
slower delivery again, makes some room and cuts this down to Kuldeep at square third man
looks to bowl a short ball into his armpits but misses his line marginally. This one's down leg, comfortably avoided. Rightly called wide
gets on top of the bounce and fends this away into the off side, quick single taken
into the gap, beats the diving Rohit at extra cover. This was slower and fuller outside off, Tharanga hit this really hard
the typical Jayasuriya whip off the hip! Short of length on middle and leg, he helps this along on the hop past short fine leg. Lovely
another slower ball and this time he held his shape to loft this cleanly over extra cover. Shardul's being picked away with ease, not going as planned for him
it's going from bad to worse for Shardul. Short and angling into middle, Tharanga slashes and gets a thick edge that flies past Dhoni to the third man boundary. 17 off that over
back of length, just around off, defended
gets this full ball to bend back in late from outside off, Thirimanne shows the full face of the bat in defense
gets a thick inside edge on the drive to short mid-on
touch ahead of length, firm push off the frontfoot to mid-off
excellent stop by Jadhav at short midwicket. He smashed this pull, got on top of the bounce to hit it nicely. Jadhav dived full length to his left to effect that one-handed stop
long, long chase for Shardul from long leg and he does well. This one's short too, he swivelled nicely and pulled it away towards deep square leg
doesn't matter, if it is short, Tharanga will pounce onto them in a jiffy. This sat up nicely and he pulled it away in front of square.

what a comeback! The party is over and this is a beauty that has nipped him out. This one pitched at length on leg stump, deviated just a wee bit to square Tharanga up completely as he looked to play towards the on side, only managed a thin edge as Dhoni gobbled up that straightforward offering.
angles a length ball on off, defended off the backfoot
prods outside the line tentatively, gets a thick inside edge that rolls to fine leg. Streaky start
gets this to nip away from length on middle, defended gently
nicely-balanced as he flicked this length ball on the pads to midwicket
sharp turn back into middle and leg, Mathews is hit on the pad as he defends outside the line. Didn't account for the late turn
down on one knee as he sweeps this off length to deep square leg
right to the pitch of the ball as he eases this full delivery to deep cover
too much flight, Mathews looks to flick but can only squeeze this to midwicket
turns this short ball with the spin to deep square leg
nicely forward as he eases this tossed up delivery to long-off
thin inside-edge onto the pad as he pushes at a length ball angling away. Played down the wrong line
great delivery. This one just zips past the outside edge. Thirimanne looked to punch this away on the up but the ball pitched at length and nipped away off the seam. 142 kph
eases this length ball to cover point
slower off-cutter, touch short in length, steered to the point fielder
punched into the gap between cover and point. Got on top of the bounce nicely
sensational stuff. Angles in a length ball that pitches just outside off and straightens, Mathews is all at sea as he pokes without any conviction. Just feeling for the delivery
driven firmly to long-off
works this full delivery from outside off towards midwicket
googly that drifts away from middle, squeezed wide of cover
drifts in a tossed up delivery on middle, he lunges forward and blocks
touch short, looks to slap this away but hits this off the bottom of the bat to cover. Looked to hit it really hard
picks the googly this time. Gets forward and plays with the bat close to the pad
gets the direction wrong this time. This length ball kept coming back in to miss leg stump and Mathews' tickle as he hopped across
squared up by the length, somehow manages to bunt that away to the off side. Looks for the single but is sent back
hits the deck hard as he delivers the length ball on middle and leg, Mathews nudges this into the gap between deep square and fine leg
works this length ball from outside off towards midwicket
attempted yorker but this one is turned into a low full toss. Mathews brings out his powerful wrists to flick this from outside off. Picked the gap between midwicket and mid-on
gets a thick outside edge to third man. Looked to work this through the leg side initially
slashed away to the third man boundary. Bumrah isn't amused. This was, in all fairness, too short. There was enough width as well. Thirimanne threw his hands at that and got away with it.
prods forward without much conviction, gets some pad on it as this rolls to short fine leg. Given runs though.
dips on him as Thirimanne lunges forward and dabs this with soft hands towards short third man
touch short, he rocks back and creams this straight to cover. Kuldeep is lucky to get away with that
nice flight, lands this just outside off, eased with the spin to mid-off
ripper of a delivery, this one's pushed through quicker. Drifts into middle and spins away sharply to square him up. Beaten

picks the gap at extra cover this time. Bhuvneshwar at wide long-off was slow to get off the blocks, so couldn't get his hands on it despite a full-length dive. Kohli isn't happy with that, but then when is he? Dare say Kohli's eyes were as expressive as Anil Kumble's were when someone misfielded.
slower length ball on off stump, bunted wide of cover point for a quick single
whipped wide of midwicket, Thirimanne wanted the run, Mathews didn't. Sent back late, turned blind and just barely managed to get back
slower off-cutter on middle and leg, tickled towards fine leg
he's owning Mathews at the moment. Straightens from length to beat Mathews' edge by a whisker.
right behind the line of that short of length delivery as he defends to short cover
just wide of Rahane at slip. Fending at a delivery that rose off a length, Mathews was squared up completely. Right into the gap between Dhoni and Rahane
good length at off stump, stretches forward and defends into the off side
tossed up at off stump again, defended down the pitch
floated full outside off, gets to the pitch to drive to sweeper cover
back of a length, spinning down leg side. Shuffles early but waits deep in the crease to tickle this fine Long leg runs to his right

wrong'un takes the edge but it doesn't carry. Length ball at off stump. Closed the face on it to try and steal a single square on the leg side. Got the outside edge that looks like it was taken on the bounce by Rahane at first slip. He has appealed though, so they're going upstairs. Soft signal is not out...and third umpire confirms it has bounced in front.
another wrong'un. On the back foot to watchfully defend this
slings it in, back of a length and headed for leg stump. Hurriedly pushed back to the bowler
short and outside off, plays it late and opens the face to run it past backward point
tossed up outside off, jams the cover drive out to sweeper cover
dangerously close to being trapped in front. This length ball spins in at middle and keeps low as Mathews camps on the back foot. Just manages to connect the flick. Straight to square leg
length at off stump, forward defence
short and wide outside off, tapped past point with a horizontal bat
looped outside off, taken on the full. Forced to long-off
length at off stump. Spins away sharply and takes the outside half as he looks to drive. Gets it straight to point who fumbles but recovers
good length, pushed through at middle stump, turned square into the leg side off the back foot
good length at middle stump, defended to square leg
wrong'un, length at leg stump. Watchfully defended with a closed face, straight to square leg
back of a length at middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
floated up at leg stump, driven on the full to long-on
good length outside off, spins away sharply after pitching. Beats the outside edge as he slashes away from the body
length on off stump, skids in with the arm. Goes deep in the crease to punch it to long-on
full at off stump, driven to long-on
nicely placed. Gets low quickly to get under this flighted delivery outside off. The stride brings him to the pitch and he connects the slog sweep beautifully to find the gap in the deep
good length outside off, mistimed drive into the covers
length at off stump, defended into the off side off the front foot
goes for the slog sweep again. This time he's beaten by flight. That dips quickly and spins past the off stump
short and wide, backs away and cuts to sweeper
tossed up at leg stump, flicked to long-on
full at off stump, driven to extra cover
length at off stump, catches him between forward and back foot defence and beats the outside edge
good length, skids through and takes the inside half as he tries to drive through the off side. Single to long on
full outside off, flicked to long leg
good length at middle stump, plays outside the line and gets an inside edge on the forward defence
good length at off stump, defended into the off side
back of a length in the corridor, opens the face to run it down, but that was too close. Beaten
back of a length in the corridor, nudged to third man off the back foot
length in the corridor, defended into the off side
good length outside off, times the drive nicely on the up. Too well to try and steal a single from mid-off. But he backs his hamstrings and makes it. Just about.
slower ball, length at middle stump. Flicked to deep square
back of a length outside off, pokes away from the body, skews it to backward point
full toss outside off, tapped straight to midwicket
full at off stump, steps out and pushed it straight to the bowler
full at off stump, nurdles it to point's left
good length outside off, pushed into the covers with an angled bat
good length at middle stump, spinning away. Defended with soft hands
good length at middle stump, takes the bottom hand off to reach this on the front foot. Nudges without control to point's right

a misguided swipe lands in front of Jadhav at third man. Looked like he slipped as he ran to his right and it looked awkward as he pulled out of the catch at the last minute. A length ball in the corridor and MAthews was down the track and slogging across the line at it. Got a big leading edge
good length at middle stump, tapped to midwicket
good length at middle stump, pushed to mid-on and he takes off for the quick run again. This time there's a direct hit. Sent upstairs. Not out.
bouncer is well directed this time, climbs at his helmet. He takes his eyes off as he plays a hook. Top edge is well in front of fine leg
back of a length at middle stump, cramps him up. Poked aerially to midwicket
good length at middle stump, flicked straight to midwicket
full outside off, steps out and gets an outside edge as he looks to drive against the turn. Backward point cleans up
tossed up outside off, steps out and bunts it to sweeper cover
good length at leg stump, dropped into the off side off the front foot
tossed up at off stump, driven off the outside half to extra cover
tossed up outside off, drilled past the bowler, long-off keeps it to one
good length outside off, poked to point's left
full at off stump, driven straight to mid-off
slower ball, length outside off. Guided straight to backward point
slower ball, good length at off stump, defended off the front foot
good length in the corridor, run to third man off the front foot
good length outside off, shuffles and pushes into the midwicket region
slower ball, back of a length in the corridor. Poked into the covers
tossed up at off stump, steps out and yorks himself. Jammed to midwicket
good length outside off. Goes for the reverse slap. Through the shot too early. It lobs up for Dhoni off the arm guard. Appeal is turned down
good length outside off. Steps out, beaten in flight. Panics and pokes in front of the body. Thick inside edge to midwicket
good length outside off. Goes for the reverse sweep and misses again. This pings his pad outside the line, so the appeal is turned down. Runs past Dhoni down leg side and long leg has to come across

glorious shot. It looks that way at first, anyway. He didn't get to the pitch after stepping out at this length ball outside off. But he got under it and lifted it straight over the bowler. Didn't connect it too well in the end and long-on was fishing for it as it sailed past the boundary
good length at middle stump, pushed to midwicket
slower ball, good length and spinning in at off stump. Dropped square into the off side, but point swoops down quickly to stop the single
back of a length in the corridor, tapped into the covers
back of a length in the corridor, cut into the turf and above point. Third man cleans up to his right
full at middle stump, clipped off the toes to deep square
yorker outside off, defended into the covers
slower ball, back of a length in the corridor. Can't get his nudge past backward point
back of a length at leg stump, whipped to square leg. Thirimanne hares down the track and has to rush back for his troubles
back of a length at off stump, punched to extra cover
quicker one, full at middle stump. Flicked straight to midwicket
quicker one, good length, pushed down leg side
back of a length at middle stump, makes room for the pull but has to adjust and tap it to midwicket. That came through quickly
short and wide, chopped to sweeper cover
short ball, spinning in from outside off. Room cuts down quickly after he shapes for the cut. Under-edges it past Dhoni's boot towards short third
good length at off stump, defended into the off side
back of a length at off stump, punched to sweeper cover
good length quicker one, an off spinner. Flicked to square leg from middle stump
good length outside off, spins back in and hits the front thigh as he fends at it. Not out on the lbw appeal
short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper
back of a length at middle stump, whipped to midwicket off the back foot
full outside off, driven straight to extra cover
full outside off, driven to sweeper to bring up his 18th ODI fifty and the second in this series
full toss at leg stump, down the track and flicked powerfully to the wide long-on boundary
back of a length outside off stump, chopped to cover point's left. He nearly collides with the umpire as he holds onto to the ball
back of a length at off stump, punched to sweeper cover
back of a length at off stump, tickled past square leg off the pads
full and drifting in at middle stump, pushed back to the bowler
good length at middle stump. Pushes at it with no feet, only to realise it's a slider. No clue as this kisses the inside edge and dribbles through towards short fine
pushes through another offspinner. It's a full toss at middle stump. Thirimanne ready with the reverse sweep, can only bunt it awkwardly through point
good length outside off, steps out and cops it on the chest as it spins into him. Wasn't to the pitch

length ball, spins in at off stump and strikes Thirimanne on the back thigh as he misses the sweep. Looks very, very close. Umpire says not out. India review. The only thing to look for here is whether he was hit in line. If yes, he is gone. There's no edge on it. Good decision from the umpire. That hit him marginally outside the line.
wrong'un, full at off stump. Driven back at the bowler
short ball, spinning down leg side. Pulled straight to deep backward square. First century stand for SL in the series

slider, good length outside off. Poked to short third man who throws it in. Dhoni with a trademark flick onto the stumps that bamboozles both the umpire and the batsman. They send it to the third umpire. It's not out.
beaten in flight but his shot falls short of long-off. Down the track and too far away as he looks to launch this over the bowler. Didn't connect at all
good length, wrong'un outside off, defended into the off side
good length outside off, defended back to the bowler off the back foot
gets outside the line of the stumps and paddles this full delivery down to deep fine leg
steps out and works this tossed up delivery with the spin to short midwicket
squeezes this full delivery towards wide long-on
driven firmly to Chahal, who deflects this onto the stumps. Not intentional. He was taking evasive action but the ball deflected off his thumb. Non-striker was well in
eased with the spin to Kohli at short cover
drops this gently to the fielder coming in from point as they scamper a quick single. Very risky, though, as there was a bit of hesitation from Thirimanne
drilled back past, Kuldeep gets his fingertips to it and takes the pace off it. Mid-on goes around to stop that
loopy full toss outside off, pushed to long-off
googly but too short, he goes across the stumps and nurdles this to short fine leg
going far too across again to work it to the leg side, this spun back in to beat the pad. Not called wide, good call.
clever variation, Mathews reads this off the pitch and angles this late to short third man

Bumrah late to react at short fine leg. He top-edged the sweep that he tried to fetch from way outside off. Bounced well in front. Bumrah took a while to decipher whether he should move forward or run back.
full toss drifting into the pads, flicked straight to short midwicket
worked against the turn to wide long-on
sharp turn back in from outside off, he makes a bit of room an steers this to deep cover
cleverly done, steps out and works this full delivery on middle and leg towards deep midwicket. 35th ODI fifty for Mathews, eighth against India, second in the series
turned from middle to midwicket, can't pick the gap this time
stays inside the crease and drills this full delivery straight to extra cover
skiddy length ball on middle, defended to the leg side
it's the knuckleball that grips the surface, stops on the batsman, who waits for it and then bunts this down to square third man
length ball outside off, punched to Kohli at cover
bangs in a short ball on middle and leg, but this was always going down leg. Way above Mathews' head as well as he ducked under it
stinging blow on the inner part of his thigh off an inside edge. Caught on the hop as he was looking to nudge this wide of square leg
a direct hit at the bowler's end would've been interesting. Mathews bunts this towards point and takes off for the run. Rahane was very quick to get to the ball, the throw was just wide though
dabs this slower delivery past the diving point fielder, who came in quick some distance. Down to third man
starts with a short ball from around the stumps to the left-hander, pulled with the angle towards fine leg
attempted bouncer which takes a long, long time to get to Mathews. 129 clicks that one. He ducks under it, Dhoni collects it just as it was dying on him
bunts this length ball to mid-off for a quick single
muscled towards deep midwicket, Rohit does the mopping up

played on! The highest fourth-wicket stand v India is over. The angle has done the trick for Bhuvi. This length ball nipped back in to cramp him for room as he tried to dab this to third man, but the ball came back in enough to sneak back in onto the stumps off the inside edge. Bhuvneshwar has his third.
bouncer angling into the stumps, Siriwardena ducks under it
forces an incoming length ball to deep cover
tucks this slower delivery into the square leg region. He wanted the second run, Mathews clearly wasn't keen and shouted 'no' immediately.
bat face turns in his hand as he looks to drive this over the cover fielder. Rolls to Kohli instea
that's a warning for a beamer. Full toss hurled towards his helmet. Mathews avoids it. Free-hit coming up
right into the blockhole, Mathews backs away and squeezes this out to Kohli at cover. Top stuff
dabs this length delivery to point
slower delivery on middle and leg, worked towards Chahal at deep fine leg
slower bouncer on off, Mathews sways out of the way thinking it would be called wide. Both umpires glance at each other and decide it was within permissible limits
excellent yorker, tailing into middle, squeezed to midwicket
dabs this delivery to point, sends the non-striker back. Wasn't keen on the single
slower length ball angling in from wide of the crease, Mathews, cramped for room, bunts it to short midwicket
works this from outside off towards wide long-on
width and he's smashed that on the up. Short of length angling away at friendly pace, he planted forward and belted this between cover and mid-off.

what a soft dismissal that. Kuldeep has the last laugh and he's got the big wicket. Mathews gave away his intention of playing the lap sweep too early, so the bowler shortened his length just a little, this was also the wrong'un. Mathews still went through with it, only get a leading edge to Dhoni.
sweep and misses. Can't review as India lost one earlier. This bounced off a length and spun back in sharply from way outside off. Height may have been in question
played for one that spins in, foxed by the googly as the healthy edge flies past MS Dhoni to the third man boundary. A slip fielder would've gobbled that up
swept uppishly towards deep backward square leg. Didn't get hold of it at all, loaded with risk
makes room and bunts this with the spin to short third man
picks the googly, driven with the spin to long-off
legbreak that skids back into middle, Hasaranga bunts this to cover. Looked to give it one proper whack
rocks back and fetches this pull from outside off to deep midwicket
cleverly done. Waits for the ball to spin back in and then angles it away past short third man
sliced away over the infield, down to Jadhav at deep cover. Looked to hit this a lot straighter
fired full outside off, squeezed wide of point as they scamper through for a run

dropped, bus still out. Wow MS Dhoni has the presence of mind to quickly hare across and then pick the ball up and hurl a rocket throw at the bowler's end to run out Hasaranga. So five seconds after an opportunity goes down, Dhoni makes up for it. Neatly gathered by Chahal as well. Why would you run for it, Hasaranga? He shaped to cut, got thick edge that fell out after hitting Dhoni's thigh and deflected to the leg side. Normally you wouldn't even call it a chance. Anyway, Sri Lanka have lost two in quick succession. It could perhaps delay their slog.
eases this full delivery down to long-on
swept from outside off, the slog lands short of Thakur at deep midwicket
excellent delivery, nicely tossed up. Gets this to dip on the left-hander who jabs that away
eased with the spin to cover. Generously tossed up again
rocks back and cuts that googly to point. Cramped for room again
driven firmly with the spin to long-off
off a thick inside edge to square leg. Looked to drive that off the rough
deceived in flight, lobs off the inside edge towards Pandey at long-on. Looked to simply chip this over cover
goes back into the crease and steers this short delivery to short third man
reaches out and drives this full delivery to wide long-off
steps out and whips this shortish delivery with the spin towards square leg

this is simply reward for persistence. Nice flight, this is a top-spinner that goes straight on as it dips on Dananjaya's forward defence after he skipped out. Dhoni effects his 100th stumping as the ball shaved past the inside edge. Couldn't have asked for an easier one to get there. What a collapse. Who would've thought they'd be scrapping for 230 when 270 was a given at one stage?
steps out and eases this full ball to deep cover
right behind the line of that length ball on the stumps.
thick edge down to third man. Looked to play it through point
uppish but down to sweeper cover. KL Rahul, the substitute fielder, is on to cover for Chahal
comical dive from Pushpakumara at the non-striker's end to complete the single. Dabbed gently towards Kuldeep at cover, was always going to be a risky single
he's clobbered this over deep midwicket. Made it look so easy. Short and this was sitting up for him to swivel back and pull.
Dropped. Shardul has completely misjudged this at deep midwicket. What's worse? That hit his shoulder and bounced over the ropes. He completely mistimed this hoick that he hit from outside off
sensational stop by Kohli at cover. Hit really hard, he dived full stretch to his right to effect a one-handed stop
can't get any power behind the pull. Straight to midwicket
hit on the helmet! Milinda was looking to pull off the frontfoot but the length ball snaked back in to beat his swing and hit the back part of his shoulder and onto the helmet.

cleaned him up. This is a poor old-fashioned slog. Bumrah slipped in a high full toss that dipped, the batsman's head fell over completely as he looked to swing this over midwicket. Off and middle stump took a royal knock.
sways out of that short ball outside off.
full and straight on the stumps, he's right behind the line of that as he blocks

Shardul redeems himself this time. High full toss on middle, he looks to whip this over square but skews it towards deep midwicket, where Thakur comes in quite some distance to complete the catch. He was on the move, but held his composure as he pouched that safely.
full and straight on the stumps, blocked
chips this incoming slower delivery towards midwicket
grips the surface and deviates away from length as Malinga blocks
thick outside edge as he looks to force this away, lands wide of Dhoni as he gets off the mark
slips in a yorker on middle and leg, squeezed towards deep midwicket
knuckleball that grips the surface and comes back in to hit him on the pad as he pushes feebly outside the line of the ball
caught on the hop as he defends this length ball that cramps him for room
play and a miss. Sees the batsman backing away and fires this wide. Beaten. Harsh call
right into the blockhole on middle from wide of the crease, he jams his bat down to keep it out
swing and a miss. Went for an ugly across-the-line swipe, but couldn't lay bat on it
looks to loft this through the line, but this falls just short of Jadhav at mid-off
good, clean strike down the ground. Full and straight on middle, but he backed away and backed himself to drill this down. Hit it beautifully. Surprised himself, perhaps.
looks to swing over cover, the ball sneaks past the inside edge through to Dhoni
slices this attempted slog over cow corner towards third man

muscles this length ball straight to the throat of KL Rahul at deep midwicket. This was sitting up nicely for him to swing over the ropes, he hit it well but it was almost as if he forgot there was a fielder there. First five-wicket haul for Bhuvneshwar Kumar in ODIs
short and wide outside off, no movement. Sits up nicely and he squeezes it between cover point and backward point on the up
good length, slight shape away from off stump, defended off the back foot
good length, angling away from off stump. Closes the face on it and taps it to mid-on
good length, in the corridor. Solidly defended into the off side

looks plumb. Rahane has missed a straight ball and he's pinged in front of middle and leg. This was full and shaping towards off side. The umpire says no. Sri Lanka take a long time before calling for the review. But it's been taken. Another fantastic decision. Replays show it was just clipping leg stump. The ball pitched and went down leg, after having moved away in the air. Umpire's call.
good length at leg stump, pushed wide of mid-on
good length, swinging in sharply towards off stump. Looks to punch on the up, but gets an inside edge into the pitch
back of a length in the corridor, pushed to extra cover on the up
good length, angled across the off stump. Deflected to third man with an open face
good length, angled across, left alone
good length at middle stump, defended into the off side with soft hands and quickly through to the other end
back of a length at off stump, pushed through point who misfields and allows the single
good length, swinging away from off stump. Chases it with his hands and is well beaten
good length at off stump, defended into the off side
good length at off stump, defended to point
back of a length at middle stump, pushed to midwicket on the up
good length at off stump, defended back down the pitch
good length, shaping away from off stump. F
back of a length at leg stump, pushed into the midwicket region with soft hands
back of a length at off stump, slices it off his stumps to third man
back of a length, slanted away from off stump. Looks to punch on the up, but he's lost his shape. Beaten
length at leg stump, clipped past square leg on the up
good length, swinging down leg, and he uses that shape to help it along fine with a flick
good length, angled wide outside off, left alone
short and wide outside off, wafts at if and is beaten
good length, swinging away from off stump. Pushed wide of mid-off with soft hands
slower ball, good length at middle stump. Rolls his wrists to control it. Flicked to fine leg's left

Munaweera fumbles a couple of times at fine leg, but holds on. Bouncer at middle stump, gets under this hook as it continues to climb on him. Bent way out of shape and top edges it, straight into the path of Munaweera who manages to somehow get it behind him after getting a hand, and then swivels to catch it
back of a length, swinging away from the corridor. Fends at it and is beaten
back of a length, swinging away from off stump. Pushed to extra cover on the up
back of a length, shaping down leg side. Shuffles across to try and whip, but misses
back of a length at off stump, defended into the off side
good length at off stump. Pushes in front of his body and loses control of his bat. Bottom hand comes out. Balls squirms through point off the outside half
good length, swinging in at leg stump. Couple of steps forward to flick to fine leg
good length, angled across off stump. Left alone
back of a length, swinging back in at leg stump. Tucked fine in his trademark languid manner. Fine leg does brilliantly though. Sprints to his right and slides to save two

top edge falls safely in front of third man. Back of a length ball, climbing up in the corridor. Sharma wafts across the line off the front foot, with his body already turned towards square leg. Poor shape on that. It lands between three converging fielders
offcutter, good length at middle stump.Tapped watchfully to square leg
back of a length, slight shape away from the channel. Left alone
nicely timed. Back of a length, angling away outside off. Stands tall and punches it off the front foot, wide of mid-off
full outside off stump. Early on the drive, toe-ends it to mid-off
good length outside off, stabs at it, runs it down to third man
bouncer, seemed too short at first look, but the umpires deem it's fair. Rohit ducks and looks towards square leg, settles for the dot ball
back of a length, climbing in at the body. He's cramped but he manages to squeeze it off the hips towards fine leg
back of a length, lifting up from an off stump line. Pushed to extra cover off the toes

stunning take at short fine leg! Pushpakumara leaps to his right to hold on to Rohit's ramp. This was angled across off stump at a length. Was well wide. But Rohit saw fine leg in and looked to clear him. Wasn't quite close to the ball and was stretching out at it. Not the best execution of that shot, but what a catch. He looked to have got enough height on it
back of a length, pushed across off stump, left alone
back of a length, swinging into the thigh guard. He gets on top of the bounce and glances it past the keeper
full outside off, mistimes the cover drive. Steals the single as it rolls harmlessly towards mid-off
back of a length in the corridor, defended into the off side off the back foot
good length, marginal shape away from off. But he has the line covered as he defends off the front foot
authority. He's pulled this back of a length ball through mid-on. It was moving away from him, but he was in position quickly and brought the axe down on it from third man's direction
back of a length outside off, defended into the off side
slower ball, good length outside off. Picks it, waits for it, dabs it to third man

short ball, shaping away from off. Takes it on with a pull and manages to keep it down. Loses all power on the shot in the bargain. Square leg dives to his right and lands on the ball with his mid-riff. He's alright though, and probably saved a run
back of a length at leg stump, whipped to square leg
back of a length, dropped in front of cover and Kohli calls confidently to make his ground easily as the throw comes in
slower ball, back of a length and slanted across off stump. He hasn't picked the variation. Goes for the big pull shot, it sneaks through from under his swing
shuffles across again, leaps to adjust for the bounce, and chips this through midwicket and wide of deep square
lovely. Fernando gives him width, and he's walking into this with a huge stride. High elbow, punched on the up, extra cover has no chance
sets up deep in the crease, picks the slower ball from off stump and hammers it over the umpire
offspin, back of a length at off stump. Pushed into the leg side with the turn
tossed up at off stump, driven to long-on
back of a length at off stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
tossed up at off stump, big stride forward, turned through square leg
legspinner. Flipper, almost. Skids through short outside off. Kohli quickly on the back foot to unleash the pull. Finds deep midwicket
another wristspinner. Back of a length at leg stump. Carefully poked into the leg side
back of a length at off stump, whipped to deep square
short ball at off stump, too slow to bother Pandey. In fact, he's early on the pull. it's uppish and wide of deep square
short ball outside off, tapped past where first slip was before moving to midwicket after that last shot
good length at middle stump, whipped to deep square
good length at off stump, tapped back to the bowler off the front foot
good length, keeps low at leg stump, but he uses the angle to run that to fine leg
legbreak, tossed up at off stump. Driven on the full to long-on
dropped short at off stump, pulls against the turn, drags it to deep midwicket's right
offbreak now. Good length outside off. Kohli picks it. Flicks to midwicket
tossed up at off stump, flicke
tossed up at off stump, driven to long-on
floated up at off stump, pushed back down the pitch
back of a length at off stump, plonked pitch-side on the off side, through for the single
good length at off stump, walks into the shot to try and pierce the gap between mid-off and extra cover. Hits it straight to mid-off
length at middle stump, shovelled to deep square
bouncer outside off stump, lobs through
good length in the cor
full at off stump, tapped to mid-on's right
offbreak, rips into middle stump from a length. Kohli exposes his stumps and barely gets an inside edge that trickles fine
tossed up outside off, pushed to long-on with the turn
good length at off stump, flicked to long-on
back of a length outside off, tapped to midwicket off the back foot
floated at a length outside off, closes the face too early, but he's played with soft hands. Leading edge doesn't carry
slow and dipping outside off, makes him reach out and flick aerially towards square leg
back of a length outside off, square drive hit into the floor and over point. But sweeper is quick and it's only one
offcutter, good length outside off. Tapped to extra cover
slower ball, back of a length in the corridor. Dances about in the crease to try and turn it into the leg side. Can't get it off the pitch
offcutter, back of a length at leg stump. Once more, reaching out for the flick. Aerial  again, but this lands wide of midwicket
slower ball, good length at off stump. Turns it to mid-on and puts pressure on him. It works. Malinga misfields, they come back for the second
slower ball, short and wide. Chopped to third man
full toss outside off, slapped straight to midwicket off the toe-end
length at middle stump, flicked through square leg
legbreak. And what a legbreak. Kohli did not pick that. Deep in the crease, shaping to flick this. It zips past his outside edge
hasn't picked it once more. Googly. Big inside edge as he lunges to defend
offbreak this time. Spinning in sharply at middle stump and keeping low. Just gets bat on the flick. Misfield at square leg, but they don't run
short and wide outside off, a leg break. Chopped to Malinga's left at sweeper. He runs as quickly as he can and plants a big foot to stop the ball
tossed up on middle from around the stumps, Pandey lunges forward and blocks
slows it down nicely, Pandey deceived in flight but somehow manages to squirt this with the spin towards cover

so beautiful from Kohli. Not all that short, but he trusted his technique and instincts. Rocked back and played this really late to glide this behind point. Quick hands, terrific hand-eye coordination
drifting into middle and leg, nurdled wide of square leg
spun away to hit him high on the rib. Went for a sweep. Turn and bounce as well. Lovely
played down the wrong line of this delivery that drifted back into the stumps, somehow managed to bunt that away. Spinners slowly starting to make an impact here.
nicely tossed up on middle, Kohli plays it with the spin towards deep cover. Just caressed it
sharp turn in from outside off, defended back to the bowler
flatter one on middle from wide of the crease, he nurdles it to square leg

runs again behind square on the off side. Short and just a touch outside off, Kohli uses the depth of the crease to pick this literally off the keeper's gloves. Beats short third man quite comfortably. Big chase by which time they were back for the third without sweating
goes back into the crease and defends this flatter delivery on middle
pushed through quicker, lands this on off stump, Pandey is solid in defense
tossed up on middle and leg, Kohli wrists this wide of short midwicket
goes back and across as he turns this shortish delivery on middle and leg to square leg
toe-ends a pull to deep midwicket. This was a long-hop. He lined himself to clear deep midwicket, but ended up playing too early. Ball stopped on him just a touch as well
lunges forward and eases this tossed up delivery to short cover
excellent use of the feet. Converted that into a full toss and whips this from way outside off to the midwicket boundary. Terrific wrist work.
caresses this wide of cover, Kohli didn't want the single. Pandey took a couple of steps down.
flatter one on middle and leg, tucked to deep square
eases this full delivery down to long-on
whips this flatter delivery from outside off towards deep midwicket
googly but this one's easily negotiated as Pandey lunges forward and deadbats it
lucky to get away. Tripe delivery down leg, Pandey pulls it straight to short fine leg
tossed up outside leg, Pandey makes room and eases this wide of mid-off
drifting into middle and leg, tucked behind square
flatter one outside off, punched to point. Can't pick the gap this time
drawn forward by the flight, Kohli eases this to short cover

saved by a full-length dive! Cut this to cover point and took off for a single. Pandey was hesitant but he had no option but to complete the run. Both feet in the air as the bat landed inside the crease and dragged through. The grip was loose to ensure it didn't plonk up when the bails came off.
slips this arm-ball on middle, Pandey plays outside the line to get a thick inside edge down to fine leg. Completely deceived but lucky
this time he's much more solid in defence. Gets a long way forward and blocks
flat-bats this pull down to beat the diving long-on fielder. Another chase, another fifty. Not even a grand celebration. Yeah, too easy, all too normal, isn't it? 45th ODI fifty
whipped into the midwicket boundary. Too short, drifting into middle, he uses the depth of the crease and punches this away
lunges forward and blocks
much fuller and drifting into middle and leg, Kohli goes onto the backfoot and punches this into the gap between deep midwicket and long-on
defended back to the bowler with the spin

gets forward, opens his wrists nicely to square drive this to the deep point boundary. There was deep cover, so the next best option to get a boundary was if he hit it behind square and he did just that. Inspired batting this

appeal for stumping but Pandey's backfoot just came back in the nick of time. It was briefly in the air. Credit to the bowler for drawing him forward and beating him in flight. Got this to spin away past the outside edge. Pandey was done in by the dip as well. The thing is Sri Lanka need to bowl these more regularly
gets forward and defends this with the spin to short cover
drifts in a full ball on the stumps, dabbed back to the bowler
gets a long, long way forward and deadbats that
goes back into the crease and whips this across the line to wide long-on
pushed through quicker on middle and leg, punched wide of long-on
flatter one on middle, sharp turn. Kohli is deep inside his crease as he blocks
flipper this time, Kohli is a little late on the backfoot defense
eased with the spin to sweeper cover
looked to hoick this across the line towards midwicket, ends up dragging it from way outside off towards long-on
didn't read that one at all. Fizzed through another flipper that Pandey had to really bring his bat down quickly to keep it out. Did so in the end
goes back into the crease and bunts this wide of cover to keep strike

Oh, Pandey. What have you done? The stage was set for him to milk the runs, possibly a big score,  but what does he do? Attempts an ugly slog sweep that he has to fetch from outside off, ends up top-edging it to Tharanga who takes a dolly at midwicket. Some relief for Sri Lanka. A 99-run stand has been broken
gets forward and defends this tossed up delivery on off stump
slides one into middle and leg, Jadhav uses the pace to paddle this down to fine leg to get off the mark
eases this full delivery between cover and point for a quick single
slow turn but it still squared Jadhav up. His right shoulder was facing the bowler as he awkwardly defended that
eased with the spin to sweeper cover
full and straight on the stumps, Jadhav blocks
this is a wrong'un which Jadhav picks off the hand. Goes back into the crease and defends
takes it on the full and sweeps this to Malinga at short fine leg
drifts in and spins away to squeeze to short point off the edge. The fielder ran in quickly and fired a wide throw to the keeper. No one backing up at square leg so an extra run ensures.
played this really nicely. Touch short, Jadhav stayed inside the crease and opened the bat face literally at the last moment to ease this past short third man. Used the pace of the bowler nicely
driven with the spin to wide long-off
slow turn from off stump, bunted to the off side
tossed up on middle, Jadhav leans forward and blocks
drifts in and straightens from around the stumps, defended back to the bowler
tossed up on middle from wide of the crease, Jadhav plays that boring forward defence
this is the arm ball but pitched a touch outside off, Jadhav read that well. Defended it off the backfoot
offbreak this time, too short, whipped to deep midwicket
nearly fell to Dananjaya for a third time. Looked to flat-bat this pull, didn't time it at all. One bounce to long-on.
rocks back and half-pulls this short ball down to long-on
turns this wrong'un from middle to short leg
driven nicely but straight to Tharanga at cover. This was too full

read this googly off the hand, nurdled this with the spin towards fine leg. Malinga was strolling towards the delivery like he would do in his back garden. Kohli saw the opportunity to pinch the third and made it back quite comfortably
drifts in a tossed up delivery on middle, Jadhav defends off the backfoot
eases this into the gap at point as he jogs the single
gets a good stride forward and defends with soft hands
punched back to the bowler. Excellent stop off his own bolwing
gets a long way forward and turns this back towards the bowler
squeezes this with the spin to backward point. Opened the bat face late to ease it to the left of point but couldn't find the gap this time
sharp turn away from outside off, Jadhav steers this behind point and scampers back for the second. Lazy fielding effort again from the Lankans

how well does he play this? Once again goes back into the crease and uses the bowler's pace to glide this away into the gap between point and short third man. Vishwa Fernando had to run around a long way from square third man to stop that
too full on the pads, Kohli whips this away into the acres of open space at deep midwicket. Good work by Hasaranga, dived full stretch to stop that
went for an expansive drive, played outside the line as the ball zipped through the inside-edge
works this away with the spin into the gap between deep midwicket and long-on, back for the second comfortably
appeal for lbw but this was sliding down leg. Kohli missed the sweep and was hit on the left pad
tossed up on middle, he lunges forward and defends
nicely flighted, Jadhav waits for this to dip on him and then works this to midwicket
rocks back and pulls this into the gap at wide long-on. This skidded back in just a touch, he got it high on the bat. Not entirely off the middle and so he wasn't in complete control
shapes to cut but misses. This one spun away little more than he anticipated
slow turn, nice flight. Lands this on middle, Jadhav gets forward and defends
nails this sweep into the deep midwicket boundary. Too much flight, drifting down leg, so it was a safe option for Jadhav to use the angle and pick the gap.
length ball angling away, bunts this down to square third man
helped over the cordon, down to third man. Too short, that's not going to cause Jadhav any trouble. It's like picking off Dosas at his favourite Pune restaurant: Vaishali
short and angling away at length, Kohli runs this down to third man
chops this attempted slash to the keeper. Didn't have the width to play a full-blooded stoke that time
angles a length ball across Jadhav, who watches it through to the keeper
excellent bouncer. Hurried Jadhav with a 143kph delivery, he swayed out of the way, though.
punched on the up to cover, on the bounce to the fielder
dabs this short delivery to short third man
clever little late cut, short third man fives over the ball and then escorts this to the boundary. Malinda Pushpakumara the culprit. He gave up. Not sure why. Just chased it through. Poor, very poor.
driven firmly to sweeper cover
short-arm jab, hammered into the deep midwicket boundary. Too short on off stump, he swiveled back and slapped that way
leans forward and eases this full delivery to short cover
crunching drive to sweeper cover
dabs this away to short third man, who parries it to point in trying to stop that
slower and fuller on middle, driven to long-off. Kohli jogs the single
short on middle, pulled to deep square leg
length ball angling away, he steers this delivery straight to backward point
beaten. Looked to upper cut this but this didn't bounce as much as Kohli expected.
too short, but Jadhav can only smash this straight to deep point
drifts in a full ball on the stumps, squeezed back to the bowler
wow, that is simply wow. Just a hint of room as he drilled this bullet drive past the cover fielder. No more than a metre or so to his left and he placed it superbly
dabs this to short third, looks for a single but is sent back
drilled again, this time it's straight to cover
reaches out to the full delivery and drives this towards deep extra cover
shapes to pull but avoids this short ball on middle
slower and fuller delivery outside off, squeezed to square third man
slow delivery outside off, Kohli whips this behind square. Long leg has plenty of work to do, he's back for the second in a jiffy
another slower delivery, this one's eased straight to point
angles a short ball into middle and leg, Kohli helps this down to deep fine leg
very, very fine. Too short and angling down leg, Jadhav takes him on with the pull and plays this very delicately to beat fine leg. Nicely done.
full at off stump, gets it off the inside half, back down the pitch, as he looks to drive through the off side
tossed up at leg stump, driven to long-on and that's 1000 runs in 2017 in his 18th match of the year
good length at off stump, defended off the front foot
tossed up outside off, no feet as he looks to hammer it through the covers. Beaten
nicely played. Good length at middle stump. Gets low and rolls his wrists over the sweep to find the square leg boundary
good length at leg stump, pushed through square leg off the back foot
bouncer, too short. Jadhav wouldn't have reached that if he tried
short ball at the chest, pulled to long leg along the ground
yorker at leg stump, clipped to fine leg
slower one, short outside off. Outfoxes Jadhav, but it's wide enough for him to let it go

overpitched at leg stump, flicked between fine leg and deep square. The two fielders converge, nearly knock each other out and in the end, even after putting in the slide, deep square has no idea where the ball is. He's looking around, sliding into the rope, as the ball follows him and makes connection
bouncer at off stump, left alone
good length outside off, pushed on the up towards point
good length, in at leg stump. Punched to midwicket off the back foot
good length at middle stump, pushed back down the pitch
good length at middle stump, defended off the inside half
full at leg stump, goes for the sweep. Locks himself up, that was too full. Manages to squeeze it to short fine
tossed up at off stump, driven to long-off
slower ball, full toss outside off. Tapped to mid-off
slower ball, overpitched outside off. Gets down one on knee and nudges it to third man to bring up his fifty
bouncer at middle stump, gets on top of the bounce, controlled pull to deep square
slower full toss outside off, drilled straight to mid-off
short at middle stump, pulled to deep midwicket
arm ball, angled down leg. Guided to fine leg with a ramp
good length, down leg side. Looks to whip it, beaten
good length outside off, pushed to point off the outside edge
tossed up at off stump, driven to extra cover
back of a length outside off, punched to sweeper cover
good length at off stump, defended into the off side
full toss at leg stump, driven to long-on
shot! Oh lovely! Tossed up at middle stump, down the track to meet it at the pitch, and he drills it over the umpire
short and wide, leg break, sliced to sweeper cover
full at off stump, pushed to point to steal the single and bring up his 30th ODI century, equalling Ricky Ponting at the age of 28.
full at leg stump, pushed to short fine leg off the front foot
back of a length outside off, poked to point off the back foot
tossed up at leg stump, flicked to short fine
tossed up at off stump, drilled to sweeper cover
tossed up at off stump, steps out and jams it out to sweeper
floated up at off stump, driven firmly to long-off
back of a length at off stump, punched to extra cover off the back foot
good length at off stump, defended into the off side
good length at off stump, defended to point
back of a length at middle stump, tapped to square leg off the back foot
back of a length and into the pads, looks to whip it through square leg, only gets a thigh guard on it after a thin edge
short and wide, cut to sweeper
full at off stump, driven inside-out to sweeper
good length at leg stump, tickled to short fine
googly, length at leg stump. Tapped to square leg off the back foot
back of a length at leg stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
short one at middle stump, goes deep in the crease and lifts the pull over midwicket with quick arms
short at middle stump, whips it over midwicket, but there's a fielder in the deep there
good length at off stump, pushed to extra cover
back of a length at off stump, pushed back to the bowler off the back foot
full at off stump, pushed to long-off
caught behind. Short and spinning away from off. Looks to nudge it past short third man, but only manages a tickle through to Dickwella who takes a neat catch
short and wide, chopped to sweeper cover. Smiles at the other end, he won't get to to finish this
tossed up at off stump, driven past the bowler to long-off to bring up the 5-0 whitewash
